name: plussed
description:
An action puzzle game where you try to match colors on each side of the board. 

Up, Down, Left, Right: Move character

Z: Match

X: Move

Hit Z to remove matching tiles above, below, and to each side of the player. 1 point each for a pair, 2 each for a triple, and 3 each for a quad. Move next to a tile and hold X to move a tile with the player.
